desc: Hi! I am programmer of LiveZone dev team. We are creating very big addon for ArmA 3 which is going to provide STALKER-inspired gameplay. Currently we need 3d modellers, animators and designers to work with our project. If you are interested in working you need to be able to work with such tools as:1) Object Builder2) Oxygen3) 3dsmax or Maya (depends on task)We are currently have alot of work needed to be done, such as:1) Importing low-poly mutants models from STALKER game series to ArmA 3 with all animations.2) Creating a proper reloading animations for new weapons, such as Gauss rifle.3) Importing particle effects from STALKER game series to ArmA 3 (anomalies). If it's going to be bad looking we could try to create anomalies using ArmA 3 vanilla particle effects.4) Creating few gear and uniform models from scratch from concept arts.We are non-profit organization so we can only provide you payment after certain job done. One payment per one task.
title: Create ArmA 3 3d models/animations/particles for huge project.
